programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Rupert & The Scarecrow - Rupert and the others meet a sad little scarecrow who's lonely and upset that the crows don't come near him.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Rupert & The Octopus’S Garden - Ping Pong's magic accidentally brings a picture of an Octopus to life and the friends need to stop it causing chaos.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep21
programme.desc: Jungle Jiggles - Raa Raa wants a partner to dance a noisy stompy dance with. All the animals have their own way of dancing, apart from Zebby who says she is too shy to dance… or is she?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep22
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Great Big Noise - Raa Raa has decided that the jingly jangly jungle is not jingly or jangly enough. He and his friends make lots of noise, but soon learn that they need to work together to make a wonderful jingly jangly jungle noise.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy “moon”, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep73
programme.desc: Violet'S Flower Festival - Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort / Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort. // When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Pups Make a Splash / Pups Fall Festival - When Cap’n Turbot’s boat runs aground, Ryder, Zuma, Skye, and Rocky must team up to save it before it sinks! // The PAW Patrol must pick all Farmer Yumi’s fruit before an early snowstorm comes! But how can Chase help?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Pups Save the Sea Turtles / Pups and the Very Big Baby - Ryder, Chase, and Rubble hatch a plan to help sea turtle hatchlings safely cross the road to get to the beach! // There’s a beached baby whale in Adventure Bay! Can the Paw Patrol work together to reunite it with its mother?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe / Pups Save a Train - Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay, but who will save them from all the mayhem she causes? // Ryder, Rubble, and Rocky call in Chase to help them free Katie and Cali’s train from a rockslide!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Pup Pup Boogie / Pups in a Fog - The PAW Patrol must work quickly to fix the tracks and remove a train car at the Adventure Bay Train Station, before the next train comes. // Ryder and the PAW Patrol battle the clock to fix the lighthouse.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Pup Pup Goose / Pup Pup and Away - Marshal gets a new BFF when a gosling he names “Fuzzy” takes a liking to him. // When Mayor Goodway accidentally takes off in a hot air balloon, Ryder and the Paw Patrol must make a dramatic rescue to save her and win the race!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep820
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Break the Ice / Rescue Knight: Pups Save Excalibark - Claw finds a way to make Sparks' breath icy and sets out to freeze all of Barkingburg. // When Chase accidentally pulls the legendary Golden Bone of Excalibark from its stone and becomes the Royal Knight, the Duke and Claw plot to ruin the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Pups on Ice / Pups and the Snow Monster - Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. // The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay. Everyone thinks it’s a “snow monster” and it’s scaring the skiers away.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep815
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Quest for the Dragon's Tooth - When Ryder and the pups are knighted by the Princess of Barkingburg, they're put to the test when a disgruntled ex-Knight gains control of a dragon and attacks the castle.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Pups Save the Circus / Pup a Doodle Do - Ryder gets a call from the Circus ringmaster – Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train! // Mayor Goodway’s purse chicken “Chickaletta” has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep819
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Tournament / Rescue Knights: Pups Save the Baby Dragons - The Paw Patrol helps a Mystery Knight, the Princess in disguise, win a tournament when Claw and Sparks show up and sabotage the event. // The Rescue Knights must save some baby dragons from Claw and reunite them with their mommy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep818
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Dozing Dragon - When the Duke and Claw use a magic cauldron to put the people of Barkingburg to sleep, their plan backfires when the enchanted fog works on Sparks, it's up to the Paw Patrol to wake up the Dragon along with everyone else in town.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Pups Pit Crew - Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to rescue Alex when he takes off on his new “super trike”.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treats / Pups Get a Lift - Mr. Porters van full of puppy food slides on the ice near the shore; Ryder and the PAW Patrol must save the day! // Katie and her cat Cali are on the chair lift when it stops leaving them above the ski hill with no way to get down!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pups Get a Rubble / Pups Save a Walrus - We see a flashback of how Rubble became a member of the Paw Patrol! // When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bunnies / Puptacular - Farmer Yumi's carrots are disappearing and she calls Ryder and the Paw Patrol for help. // Katie is excited to be entering one of the Paw Patrol pups into a puppy grooming competition "Puptacular" in the next town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bay / Pups Save a Goodway - Ryder and the PAW Patrol clean up a small oil spill in the water to save the animals in Adventure Bay. // When Adventure Bay’s famous statue ends up at the bottom of the Bay, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to find a clever way to bring it back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hoedown / Pups Save Alex - It’s Adventure Bay Western Days, when a herd of cows escape from a train at the railway station! // When their friend Alex decides he wants to be a member of the PAW Patrol the PUPS and Ryder let him come along for the ride.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Day / Pups Turn on the Lights - Alex loses his back pack on the first day of school! Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to help him find it. // It’s Chase’s birthday and the pups are planning a surprise party. A storm causes the power to go out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pool Day / Circus Pup-Formers - It’s a hot day and the pups head for the water park – but the pool is empty! Paw Patrol to the rescue. // When the animals don’t show up in time for the Circus to start; Ryder and the Paw Patrol step in to help.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Pups Save a Super Pup / Pups Save Ryder's Robot - Rubble is pretending to be a super pup but get’s himself in some trouble. Ryder and the Paw Patrol have to save Rubble! // When Ryder’s Robot Pup breaks and starts going wild around Adventure Bay, it takes the whole Paw Patrol to help Ryder find it.

programme.desc: Pups Save a Monkey / Pups Save a Hoot - When Mandy the monkey escapes from her cage on the train, Ryder and the PAW Patrol are lead on a wild chase! // During a bad wind storm, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to save an Owl trapped in a blown over tree and reunite her baby.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep819
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Tournament / Rescue Knights: Pups Save the Baby Dragons - The Paw Patrol helps a Mystery Knight, the Princess in disguise, win a tournament when Claw and Sparks show up and sabotage the event. // The Rescue Knights must save some baby dragons from Claw and reunite them with their mommy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Pups Fight Fire - Marshall proves he is a true hero when he stops to put out a real fire on the beach during a race against the clock for a trophy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep124

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep125

The race is on to get the cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Pups Save the Penguins / Pups Save a Dolphin Pup - Someone has been swiping fish off Cap’n Turbot’s boat, so he calls Ryder and the PAW Patrol to help investigate. // Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream! Now it’s up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Pups Save the Space Alien / Pups Save a Flying Frog - An Alien Spaceship crash lands at Farmer Yumi’s! The PAW Patrol will help out the stranded little extra-terrestrial to get back to his home planet! // Marshall’s new pet frog, Smiley, is going to be in a jumping contest!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake / Pups Save the Parade - Jake and Chase go deep cave spelunking when Jake ends up getting his ankle stuck between some fallen rocks! // Adventure Bay Parade Day goes awry when Alex puts too many balloons on Katie’s bathtub float. It literally “floats” away!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Pups Save the Diving Bell / Pups Save the Beavers - While the Turbots are deep sea diving, their diving bell ends up stuck! PAW Patrol to the rescue! // A storm washes away a beaver's dam, so he chomps all the wood at Farmer Yumi's! The PAW Patrol arrives to help rebuild his home!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The New Pup - The PAW Patrol rolls out in their new PAW Patroller to save Jake when he gets stranded in the ice fields, but a new pup also pops up to lend a paw, the brave ranger, Everest!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Pups and the Big Freeze / Pups Save a Basketball Game - A winter ice storm causes trouble all over Adventure Bay. The PAW Patrol races to the rescue! // Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdinger’s Basketball team to a game. The pups pitch in and become the Adventure Bay All-Stars!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep904
programme.desc: Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: The Cat Who Roared / Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: Saving the Safe - Leo and Rory join the Paw Patrol on a visit to the jungle, and end up helping to rescue an injured baby monkey. // When Mayor Humdinger rebuilds Meow Meow to break into Mayor Goodway's new safe, the Cat Pack joins the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe - Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay, but who will save them from all the mayhem she causes?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Pups and the Mischievous Kittens - To win the Spotless Town award, the PAW Patrol pups must save Adventure Bay from Mayer Humdinger's Kitten Catastrophe Crew!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Pups Save a Stowaway - When the pups find a stowaway on their trip to the Icy Tundra, they must rescue a run-away kitty on a run-away Snow Cat!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save the Cat Show - Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep903
programme.desc: Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: Rocket Rescuers / Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: Pups and Cats Save the Golden Lion Mask - Cat-Pack members Wild and Shade team up with the Mighty Pups to stop a runaway rocket. // When the Ruff-Ruff Pack swipes a priceless golden lion mask from the museum, Shade and Wild must help the Paw Patrol to retrieve the stolen artifact

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Pups Leave Marshall Home Alone - With the other pups at parachute training, Marshall must get a group of loose kittens back all by himself. But he has the help of the other pups' packs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Pups Save the Shivering Sheep - Farmer Al's sheep runaway and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep902
programme.desc: Pups Meet The Cat Pack - When Mayor Humdinger transforms his robot cat Meow-Meow into a tiger-sized metal-eating menace, the Paw Patrol calls in the Cat Pack to help stop the creature.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Pups Save an Ace - When stunt pilot Ace runs into engine trouble, It’s up to Skye and the PAW Patrol to save her and her plane so the air show can go on!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Pups Save a Talent Show / Pups Save the Corn Roast - It's Adventure Bay Talent Show Day! When the mayor is afraid there won't be enough acts, the super talented Pups can definitely help out! // When Chickaletta gets trapped in a Corn Field Maze, the PAW Patrol races to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep211

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Pups Save the Parrot / Pups Save the Queen Bee - The PAW Patrol heads to the jungle to help their friend Carlos find his lost parrot, Mateo! // When the PAW Patrol discovers a beehive in Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse, Ryder and the pups must work together to find the bees a new home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Pups Save a Mer-Pup - When the Pups and Cap’n Turbot camp out under the very rare Magical Mer Moon, magical things begin to happen. Lured by the mystical Mer-Pup song, the PAW Patrol is transformed into Mer -Pups themselves!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Pups Save an Elephant Family / Pups and the Mischievous Kittens - The pups' road trip through the savanna becomes a mission to reunite and rescue an elephant family! // To win the Spotless Town award, the PAW Patrol pups must save Adventure Bay from Mayer Humdinger's Kitten Catastrophe Crew!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Pups Save a Friend / Pups Save a Stowaway - When Marshall decides to take a break from the PAW Patrol, the pups jump into action to bring him back! // When the pups find a stowaway on their trip to the Icy Tundra, they must rescue a run-away kitty on a run-away Snow Cat!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pups' Adventures in Babysitting / Pups Save the Fireworks - Mayor Goodway calls on the Paw Patrol to rescue her twin niece and nephew from a tree, and then twin sit for the day! // Expecting the fireworks for Adventure Bay Day, Mayor Goodway receives a package of piglets after a mix-up!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sniffle / Pups and the Ghost Cabin - A sick day for the PAW Patrol? While Rubble and Ryder search for Farmer Al's runaway pigs, Marshall cares for his sniffly pup pals! // First Rubble's lunch disappears, then Jake's lunchbox walks away! Could it be a ghost?!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Pups Save an Adventure / Pups Save a Surprise - While camping, Marshall and the PAW Patrol help Alex learn about Fire Safety! // It seems like a regular day in Adventure Bay as the Paw Patrol is called to duty. But the pups are in for a surprise - PAW Patrol Appreciation Day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep904
programme.desc: Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: The Cat Who Roared / Cat Pack/Paw Patrol Rescue: Saving the Safe - Leo and Rory join the Paw Patrol on a visit to the jungle, and end up helping to rescue an injured baby monkey. // When Mayor Humdinger rebuilds Meow Meow to break into Mayor Goodway's new safe, the Cat Pack joins the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.desc: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe - Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay, but who will save them from all the mayhem she causes?

programme.desc: Pups Save the Cat Show - Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined

programme.desc: Pup-Fu! - The pups are learning the ancient art of Pup-Fu! They'll need it to get back Sensei Farmer Yumi's ancient martial arts scroll, after Mayor Humdinger's Kit-tastrophe Crew use their Cat-Jitsu skills to steal it!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Pups Save a Wedding - After a big storm, the PAW Patrol must save Farmer Yumi's barn in time for his wedding!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mayor's Race / Pups Save an Outlaw's Loot - It’s the annual Mayor’s Race, and Mayor Humdinger is planning his most devious cheating scheme yet. // When Ryder comes across a map for buried treasure, Mayor Humdinger snatches the map and runs off to find the loot for himself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Pups Save Walinda / Pups Save a Big Bone - The PAW Patrol plan a special celebration for Wally the Walrus. When he doesn't show up, they find he has a special new friend named Walinda! // During Cap’n Turbot's archaeological dig, a rock slide unearths a big dinosaur bone!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Pups Save the Penguins / Pups Save a Dolphin Pup - Someone has been swiping fish off Cap’n Turbot’s boat, so he calls Ryder and the PAW Patrol to help investigate. // Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream! Now it’s up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Pups Save the Space Alien / Pups Save a Flying Frog - An Alien Spaceship crash lands at Farmer Yumi’s! The PAW Patrol will help out the stranded little extra-terrestrial to get back to his home planet! // Marshall’s new pet frog, Smiley, is going to be in a jumping contest!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake / Pups Save the Parade - Jake and Chase go deep cave spelunking when Jake ends up getting his ankle stuck between some fallen rocks! // Adventure Bay Parade Day goes awry when Alex puts too many balloons on Katie’s bathtub float. It literally “floats” away!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Pups Save the Diving Bell / Pups Save the Beavers - While the Turbots are deep sea diving, their diving bell ends up stuck! PAW Patrol to the rescue! // A storm washes away a beaver's dam, so he chomps all the wood at Farmer Yumi's! The PAW Patrol arrives to help rebuild his home!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep206

programme.desc: Sunflower Beanstalk - One of Logi-Po's plants has grown too big for the HQ... and it's still growing...

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep27
programme.desc: It's time to see the moon - JoJo wonders why the moon is a funny shape. Gran Gran explains why the moon appears to change shape in the night sky, and together they make a moon diary for JoJo to take home.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep55
programme.desc: Monty Repeats Himself - A teacher asks Monty to paint something new instead of repeating himself, but Monty thinks repetition can sometimes be useful.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep54
programme.desc: Parcel Puzzle - When Violet tells Monty that a problem is too big for a little boy to solve, he wonders if only big people can solve big problems.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Shadowlands - On a picnic in the park, Bluey and her friends play Shadowlands. Coco keeps taking shortcuts so Bluey has to show her that following the rules can make the game more fun.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep33
programme.desc: The Babysitting Badge - Duggee has a job to do outside of the Clubhouse. But who will look after the Squirrels? King Tiger of course, he has his Babysitting Badge. But then the Squirrels end up babysitting King Tiger!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep31
programme.desc: The A Cappella Badge - The Squirrels are inspired to learn how to sing a cappella style after hearing a famous bird quartet singing in a nearby tree.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep30
programme.desc: The Topiary Badge - When the Squirrels see Duggee practicing his impressive Topiary skills they are keen to try some of their own - and promptly put their new talents into practice in order to tame some very wild woods!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep14
programme.desc: Bullet Train, Japan - All aboard for a high-speed adventure, as the Go Jetters visit Japan's Bullet Train.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep13
programme.desc: Central Park, New York - Glitch visits Broadway, while the Go Jetters tackle a huge cloud of smog in Central Park.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Daddy Robot - Bluey and Bingo don't want to tidy the playroom, so they get Daddy Robot to do it. But when Bluey takes things too far, Daddy Robot malfunctions!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Keepy Uppy - Bluey, Bingo and Mum are enjoying playing Keepy-Uppy around the house, when Dad joins in and the game becomes the ultimate test of skill.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: Ankylosaur & Club - Andy travels 70 million years back in time on a mission to replace a broken museum artefact and meets the armoured tank of the dinosaur world - Ankylosaur.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Helpful Machines - CBeebies' very own motorbike rider Grace shows off three amazing machines that all help other machines! Grace drives a tugboat, shows off incredible refuelling planes and tows a bus in a recovery truck.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) Ep8
programme.desc: Captain's Log - Captain Captain entrusts Sandy and Seaweed with her treasured Captain's Log!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep29
programme.desc: The Favourite Badge - The Squirrels learn what a favourite is, but have trouble deciding what their own favourite things are, so they make a film asking some of their friends what is special to them to help narrow it down.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep28
programme.desc: The Round Up Badge - The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and his old pal Rodeo Horse, who teaches them how to be cowhands... and earn their Round Up Badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep27
programme.desc: The Game Show Badge - The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them by putting on a Game Show, with some help hosting from his good friend Ladybug.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep12
programme.desc: White Cliffs of Dover, England - The Go Jetters race to save the White Cliffs of Dover when Glitch digs for classroom chalk.

programme.desc: Harbin Ice City, China - GrimHQ overheats so lands in Harbin Ice City, melting the amazing ice sculptures.

programme.desc: All the Talk - On a windy day, Nelly and Nora discover that everything's talking, even the clothesline!

programme.title: Special Program
programme.desc: How US corporations try to stop a resurgence of labor unions - Are we seeing the US labor rights movement’s David and Goliath moment? A rising wave of social inequality, brought into stark relief by crises like the COVID-19 pandemic, has pushed workers for megacorporations around the world to campaign for more rights. We look at how the global labor landscape is changing, especially in the United States, as more workers move to unionize.

programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Climbing Japan: Mt. Nyoho
programme.desc: Autumn in Oku-Nikko. Join us on a climb to the summit of Mt. Nyoho (2,483m). The trail begins with 1,445 steps, followed by a long and difficult path with many ups and downs.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline Biz
programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Through The Kitchen Window
programme.desc: Ayu sweetfish thrives in the pristine rivers running through a lush valley in western Tokyo. We drop by the kitchens of two men whose lives are closely linked to the delicacy.

programme.title: Dig More Japan
programme.desc: Japan has long believed in using things to the fullest. Join this new episode, as we dig a little deeper into this waste-not-want-not philosophy that the Japanese call "mottainai."

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Hina dolls, which represent the emperor, empress, and the imperial court, are presented to girls on the first March 3rd, Girl's Day celebration after they are born.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: The Bird Cafe
programme.desc: We visit an Edo-style open-air teahouse, where the townspeople enjoyed refreshments, conversation, and the company of exotic birds. For them, these outings were about more than a good time.

programme.title: Fukushima Time-Lapse 5Min.
programme.desc: 10 years on from the 2011 tsunami and nuclear disaster, time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke seeks out the undiminished beauty of Fukushima. This time we focus on mountains.

programme.title: Treasure Box Japan: Tochigi
programme.desc: Lotus blossoms in rain, best seen in early summer, June and July, at Tsuganosato Park.

programme.title: Kabuki Kool
programme.desc: Chushingura is one of the most popular plays. It is based on a sensational historical incident when 47 masterless samurai avenged the death of their lord. Ainosuke explores it in a two-part series.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth

programme.title: Core Kyoto
programme.desc: Today: Yase Shamenchi Odori, a dance of gratitude for imperial favor. The ancient capital, Kyoto, continues to be innovative after 1,200 years. We dive deep into its core in this definitive program.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Shirley Raines provides makeovers for the homeless in downtown L.A. Beauty services bring back dignity and hope to them. We ask her about her expanding organization and what's most needed today.

programme.title: Design Talks Plus
programme.desc: Today's theme: Subtlety. Pale colors that harmonize with their settings, and soft shapes. Product designer Suzuki Gen is known worldwide for his subtle designs. Explore this beautiful, quiet world.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep17
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
